original_title: 涙と笑いのハッピークラス 4年1組 命の授業
overview: Mr. Kanamori, a teacher of a 4th grade class, teaches his students not only how to be students, but how to live. He gives them lessons on teamwork, community, the importance of openness, how to cope, and the harm caused by bullying.
title: Children Full of Life
